bug.author: fritzo
bug.summary: Pyro docs no longer show up on Google
bug.description: (sorry to use github for a website issue but imho this a serious). When I Google for <denchmark-link:https://www.google.com/search?q=pyro+discretehmm>"pyro discretehmm"</denchmark-link> , all I see is examples and blog posts, and results pointing to rtd. When I narrow to <denchmark-link:https://www.google.com/search?q=docs.pyro.ai+discretehmm>"docs.pyro.ai discretehmm"</denchmark-link> , I do see links to rtd but they point to module source code rather than the actual docs. Does anyone have an idea why docs seem broken? Do we have a norobots.txt or prohibited link on our rtd pages?

comments.comment: Maybe this is just google autocorrecting "discretehmm" to "discrete hmm" which doesn't appear on the desired page.
